name: scrna-seq-fastq-to-matrix-10x-cellplex

definition.annotation: Comprehensive preprocessing for 10X Genomics CellPlex multiplexed single-cell RNA-seq data. Processes Cell Multiplexing Oligo (CMO) FASTQ files with CITE-seq-Count including required CellPlex-specific translation steps. Simultaneously processes gene expression FASTQ files with STARsolo and DropletUtils for alignment and cell filtering, and formats outputs for seamless import into Seurat/Scanpy (Read10X function).
definition.name: Single-Cell RNA-seq Preprocessing: 10X Genomics CellPlex Multiplexed Samples

readme:
# Single-Cell RNA-seq Preprocessing: 10X Genomics Data to Analysis-Ready Formats

These workflows are inspired by the [training material](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-preprocessing-tenx/tutorial.html). The output is in a 'bundle' format with three files (one matrix, one with genes, one with barcodes) which is similar to the cellranger output format, and is compatible with any Read10X function (Seurat or Scanpy). There are 2 types of output collections: either one collection with all matrices, one collection with all genes and one collection with all barcodes (compatible with post processing in galaxy) or a single nested collection with one sub-collection per sample with the 3 files (easier for local downstream analysis).

Both workflows are designed for fastqs from 10X libraries v3. One is for regular 10X library (one library per sample), while the other one is for CellPlex 10X library which allows to multiplex samples using CMOs (see [this blog article](https://www.10xgenomics.com/blog/answering-your-questions-about-sample-multiplexing-for-single-cell-gene-expression)).

## Input datasets

- Specific for each experiment:
    - For both workflows: you need a list of pairs of fastqs with gene expression.
    - For CellPlex: you need in addition a list of pairs of fastqs with CMO.
    - For CellPlex: you need a list of csv which describes samples and CMO used:
        - first column is the sequence and second column is the name
    /!\ The order of samples need to be exactly the same between the collection of fastqs of CMO and the collection of csv.

- Common for all experiments:
    - Gene annotations: A gtf file with gene locations
    - List of barcodes used by 10X. You can download it at https://zenodo.org/record/3457880/files/3M-february-2018.txt.gz

## Input values

- reference genome: this genome needs to be available for STAR
- Barcode Size is same size of the Read: if the length of your R1 of GEX matches the size of cell barcode + UMI set to true. If your R1 contains trailling A, put false.
- number of cells: If you make it too large no cell barcode correction will be performed to demultiplex CMOs.

## Processing
- Gene expression processing:
    - Reads are aligned to the genome, asigned to genes, cell barcode and UMI with STAR Solo
    - MultiQC report the mapping rate and the number of reads attributed to genes
    - The output of STAR Solo is filtered with Droplet Utils to remove cellular barcodes which are probably empty.
    - The output of Droplet Utils is reorganized to be:
```
Main Collection:
    - Sample 1:
        - matrix.mtx
        - barcodes.tsv
        - genes.tsv
    - Sample 2:
        - matrix.mtx
        - barcodes.tsv
        - genes.tsv
...
```
For the CellPlex workflow:
- CMO processing:
    - CITE-Seq Count is used to asign reads and generate a matrix where 'genes' are the CMO and 'unmapped'.
    - Cellular barcodes are translated to match the cellular barcodes of Gene expression see [this article](https://kb.10xgenomics.com/hc/en-us/articles/360031133451-Why-is-there-a-discrepancy-in-the-3M-february-2018-txt-barcode-whitelist-).
    - Reorganize the output with UMI matrices to match the same structure as gene expression matrices.

## Test data

The test dataset has been produced to make it as small as possible in order to make the workflow pass on CI.

- The CMO reads come from [zenodo](https://zenodo.org/records/10229382) and have been sampled to 0.1 with seqtk.
- The GEX reads come from SRR13948489 but have been subsetted to the cells selected in the above zenodo.
changelog:
# Changelog

## [0.6.3] - 2025-06-09

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/rna_starsolo/rna_starsolo/2.7.11a+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/rna_starsolo/rna_starsolo/2.7.11b+galaxy0`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_replace_in_line/9.5+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_replace_in_line/9.5+galaxy2`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_awk_tool/9.5+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_awk_tool/9.5+galaxy2`

## [0.6.2] - 2025-03-10

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy3`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_replace_in_line/9.3+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_replace_in_line/9.5+galaxy0`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_awk_tool/9.3+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_awk_tool/9.5+galaxy0`

## [0.6.1] - 2025-03-03

### Added

- Added individual DropletUtils outputs for processing with scanpy tools

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.24.1+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy0`

## [0.5] - 2024-09-25

## [0.4] - 2024-04-08

- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_awk_tool/9.3+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_awk_tool/9.3+galaxy1`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_replace_in_line/9.3+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_replace_in_line/9.3+galaxy1`

## [0.3] - 2024-02-12

First release.
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1200 620" role="img" aria-label="scRNA-seq 10X CellPlex preprocessing workflow diagram">
  <title>Single-Cell RNA-seq Preprocessing: 10X Genomics CellPlex</title>
  <desc>Processes multiplexed CellPlex scRNA-seq data: gene expression FASTQs via STARsolo and DropletUtils, CMO FASTQs via CITE-seq-Count, with output formatted for Seurat/Scanpy.</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <rect width="1200" height="620" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1200" height="620" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1200" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">scRNA-seq: 10X Genomics CellPlex Multiplexed Samples</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- GEX Track -->
  <!-- GEX FASTQs -> Process GEX (subworkflow) -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 115 C 260 115, 310 140, 390 140"/>
  <!-- Ref genome -> Process GEX -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 195 C 260 195, 320 160, 390 160"/>
  <!-- GTF -> Process GEX -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 275 C 260 275, 330 180, 390 180"/>
  <!-- Barcodes -> Process GEX -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 345 C 260 345, 340 195, 390 195"/>
  <!-- Process GEX -> Seurat GEX output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 590 170 C 650 170, 980 120, 1050 120"/>

  <!-- CMO Track -->
  <!-- CMO FASTQs -> CITE-seq-Count -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 435 C 260 435, 320 430, 390 430"/>
  <!-- CMO sequences -> CITE-seq-Count -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 505 C 260 505, 340 450, 390 450"/>
  <!-- CITE-seq-Count -> Reorganize CMO -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 590 440 C 650 440, 700 430, 770 430"/>
  <!-- Reorganize CMO -> Seurat CMO output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 970 430 C 1000 430, 1010 270, 1050 270"/>

  <!-- QC connections -->
  <!-- Process GEX -> MultiQC -->
  <path class="connection-qc" d="M 590 200 C 640 200, 650 530, 770 530"/>

  <!-- INPUT NODES -->
  <!-- GEX FASTQs -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,75)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">FASTQ PE (GEX)</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Gene expression</text>
    <text x="90" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">paired-end reads</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Reference genome -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,165)">
    <rect width="180" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Reference Genome</text>
    <text x="90" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">STAR-indexed genome</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="35" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- GTF -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,240)">
    <rect width="180" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Gene Annotations</text>
    <text x="90" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">GTF annotation file</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="35" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Cell barcodes -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,315)">
    <rect width="180" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Cell Barcodes</text>
    <text x="90" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">10X v3 whitelist (3M)</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="35" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- CMO FASTQs -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,395)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">FASTQ PE (CMO)</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Cell Multiplexing</text>
    <text x="90" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Oligo reads</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- CMO sequences -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,490)">
    <rect width="180" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">CMO Sequences</text>
    <text x="90" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Sample-to-CMO mapping</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="35" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING NODES -->
  <!-- Process GEX (subworkflow: STARsolo + DropletUtils) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(390,110)">
    <rect width="200" height="110" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Process GEX Reads</text>
    <text x="100" y="50" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">STARSolo alignment</text>
    <text x="100" y="62" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">DropletUtils cell calling</text>
    <text x="100" y="80" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#b0c4d8" text-anchor="middle">(subworkflow)</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="55" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="55" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- CITE-seq-Count -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(390,390)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">CITE-seq-Count</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Quantify CMO tags</text>
    <text x="100" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">per cell barcode</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Reorganize CMO output -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(770,390)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="18" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Reorganize CMO</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Format for Seurat</text>
    <text x="100" y="67" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Read10X import</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT NODES -->
  <!-- GEX Matrix output -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(1050,95)">
    <rect width="80" height="60" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="80" height="22" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="80" height="11" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="40" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">GEX Matrix</text>
    <text x="40" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="7" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Seurat / Scanpy</text>
    <text x="40" y="50" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="7" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">compatible</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- CMO Matrix output -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(1050,245)">
    <rect width="80" height="60" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="80" height="22" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="80" height="11" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="40" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">CMO Matrix</text>
    <text x="40" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="7" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Seurat / Scanpy</text>
    <text x="40" y="50" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="7" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">compatible</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- MultiQC Report -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(770,510)">
    <rect width="120" height="60" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e9ecef" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect width="120" height="22" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="120" height="11" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="60" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">MultiQC Report</text>
    <text x="60" y="42" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Alignment QC stats</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="30" r="6" fill="#10b981" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- LEGEND -->
  <g transform="translate(20,585)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="8" height="8" rx="2" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="14" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Input</text>
    <line x1="65" y1="4" x2="105" y2="4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="112" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="180" y1="4" x2="220" y2="4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="227" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">QC / plot</text>
    <rect x="290" y="0" width="8" height="8" rx="2" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="304" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Output</text>
    <rect x="355" y="0" width="8" height="8" rx="2" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="369" y="8" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Report / QC</text>
  </g>
</svg>
